@confluencekid @kaupapa that sucks. Have you tried changing your password and in settings revoking access to apps that access your account?
@kaupapa sounds like password change and revoking app access might be a healthy thing to do (note to self)
. @kaupapa ok I just found this post which outlines what to do if you find your following someone w/o your consent https://t.co/rTMF8VhaZt
